name: Blobby-Volley-2-Switch
author: SilentFlyBy
description:
This is a port of the popular Volleyball game you all know from the good old LAN-party days. This is still in heavy WIP, so expect some features to be broken.

What works:
Local play with 2 full controllers ("full" means no "single-mode" Joycons)
Bots and custom bot scripts
Ruleset scripts
